meta.title: Our Mission - Make Your Dream of Studying in France Come True - Wendogo
meta.description: Discover Wendogo's mission: to support you from A to Z in your study project in France with care and expertise.

hero.title: Make Your Dream of Studying in France Come True
hero.description: Wendogo is the reference platform for supporting international students in their study project in France. From guidance to settlement, we are your trusted partner.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.subtitle: To democratize access to French higher education and support every student in achieving their academic project.

democratize.text: access to information about French programs

accompany.text: each student humanely in their journey

maximize.text: chances of success through our expertise

commitment.title: Our Commitment
commitment.description: We are committed to providing personalized, transparent, and caring support to every student, putting our expertise at the service of their study project's success in France.

values.title: Our Values
values.subtitle: The principles that guide our daily actions and define how we support students.

benevolence.title: Care
benevolence.description: We understand that your study project is unique and precious. Every student is supported with empathy and respect.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: Our team of experts guides you to the best programs and optimizes every step of your journey.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.description: Clear pricing, transparent process, honest advice. We defend your interests with complete transparency.

accessibility.title: Accessibility
accessibility.description: Wherever you are in the world, our 24/7 support accompanies you in your language and according to your time zone.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Complete support for all stages of your study project in France.

orientation.title: Personalized Guidance
orientation.description: Analysis of your profile and recommendations for programs suited to your goals.

visa.title: Visa Support
visa.description: Complete support for your student visa file and Campus France procedure.

support.title: Continuous Support
support.description: Support before, during, and after your arrival in France.

cta.title: Ready to Start Your Academic Adventure in France?
cta.description: Join thousands of students who made their dream of studying in France come true with Wendogo.
